description: Try our easy to follow Hoisin Chicken Stir-Fry recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Hoisin Chicken StirFry Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 red onion, cut into thin wedges
750ml Wine option: Cat Amongst the Pigeons Shiraz
750ml Wine option: South Island Marlborough Sauvignon Blanc

recipeInstructions.text: Cut chicken breast in half through the centre and thinly slice. Heat 2 tsp oil in a wok over a high heat. Stirfry chicken in batches and transfer to a plate.

Heat remaining oil in wok. Add onion, garlic and ginger. Stirfry for 2 minutes or until softened. Add capsicum, peas and corn. Stir-fry for 2 minutes. Add 1 tbs of water, cover and cook for 2 minutes or until vegetables are tender.

Combine hoisin sauce, vinegar and sesame oil in a jug. Return chicken to wok with sauce mixture, spring onion and cashews. Cook for 2 minutes or until heated through. Prepare noodles as per packet instructions and serve with stirfry.
